message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  What do you think?
I'm not giving you the majority, but I'm willing to give you a decent share. Take it or leave it.
Okay, I see you're playing hardball. I'll offer you a 60/40 split in your favor this time. It's a good deal considering the shrinking value of the money. Let's make a deal.
